pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 482 MB available space
